submission:
from collections import defaultdict
from bisect import bisect_left
class Solution(object):
    def minChanges(self, nums, k):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type k: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        m=defaultdict(list)
        o=[]
        n=len(nums)
        for i in range(n//2):
            a=nums[i]
            b=nums[n-i-1]
            diff=abs(a-b)
            x = max(a,b,k-a,k-b)
            m[diff].append(x)
            o.append(x)
        ans=n
        o.sort()

        for diff, values in m.items():
            t=bisect_left(o, diff)
            t=t*2+(n//2-t)
            for x in values:
                if x<diff:
                    t-=2
                else:
                    t-=1
            ans=min(ans,t)
        return ans
